scripts.pull: git submodule init && git submodule update --remote
scripts.build: (cd elm-prefab; yarn install; yarn build; cd ..)
scripts.generate: (yarn clean && mkdir output && cp -r templates/* output && yarn build; node ./elm-prefab/dist/index.js src/Generate.elm  --flags='{"namespace": "TnG"}')
scripts.gen-test: yarn generate ; cd output ; elm make Main.elm
scripts.test-args: (yarn clean && mkdir output && cp -r templates/* output && yarn build; node ./elm-prefab/dist/index.js src/Generate.elm --output=./output2 --flags-from=api-config.json)
scripts.generate-engine-docs: cd templates ; rm -rf elm-stuff ; elm-doc-preview --output engine-docs.json ; cd ..
scripts.gen-engine: yarn generate-engine-docs; yarn elm-prefab install templates/engine-docs.json
